text: Woh mooh par kehte hain ke hum mutii e farmaan hain magar jab tumhare paas se nikalte hain to inmein se ek giroh raaton ko jamaa hokar tumhari baaton ke khilaf mashware karta hai. Allah unki yeh saari sarkashiyan likh raha hai, tum unki parwaah na karo aur Allah par bharosa rakkho, wahi bharose ke liye kafi hai
